snippet.title: Mutant Legion - Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Out now!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/3299550/Mutant_Legion/

Mutant Legion is a charming but brutal top down shooter:
Play as a mercenary on a mission to defeat all enemies, get paid and ultimately get out alive. Pick up and discover various weaponry, secrets and the path to victory. Coming soon!!

© Clogsoft 2024
